block.p: YOFFIE--William. The Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations mourns the passing of William Yoffie, the beloved father of our esteemed colleague and friend Rabbi Eric Yoffie, President, Union for Reform Judaism. We pray that the Yoffie family will be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Harold Tanner, Chairman Malcolm Hoenlein, Executive Vice Chairman

YOFFIE--William. The Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations mourns the passing of William Yoffie, the beloved father of our esteemed colleague and friend Rabbi Eric Yoffie, President, Union for Reform Judaism. We pray that the Yoffie family will be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Harold Tanner, Chairman Malcolm Hoenlein, Executive Vice Chairman
